Name: Adventurer
Text: Hey Kid, I need your help.

Name: Adventurer
Text: You'll get something good if you do!

Name: Adventurer
Text: Yup! All I need you to do is find a lost scroll I dropped around here.

Name: Adventurer
Text: It's a brown scroll. You'll know it when you see it.

Name: Me
Text: Ok. I guess I'll go look for it then.
